column4: in the process of; in the middle of; (key word of a progressive construction)
(used to indicate an action in progress)
exactly; right; that's just the way it is
to be like; to take after
to be engaged in (work study, etc.) at a fixed time
(a measure word for mountains, buildings, and other similar immovable objects)
to have a pleasant journey; bon voyage
to shake; to tremble; to shiver
